short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When clicking in a 'Post to Twitter/X' button, replaces the url to post in Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can easily share from websites to Bluesky. Just click on the current Twitter (X) share button on the page, and the extension will redirect you to post on Bluesky.

Also, if the website doesn't have any share button, you can click on the extension icon to share it directly to Bluesky.

This extension is not affiliated with Bluesky in any way.

This extension is in active development. Please report any bugs at https://share.notx.blue/bugs. The code is available at: https://share.notx.blue/crx.

Icon "Share" by Mourad Mokrane from Noun Project (CC BY 3.0)
https://thenounproject.com/icon/share-23580/
